Html:
Hi,

Does anybody know how to add a list of recently opened files to the Ribbon Application Menu?

Thanks

This worked for me

        <r:Ribbon 
             Title="{Binding RelativeSource={RelativeSource FindAncestor,AncestorType={x:Type Window}},Path=Title}">
            <r:Ribbon.ApplicationMenu >
                <r:RibbonApplicationMenu>
                    <r:RibbonApplicationMenu.RecentItemList>
                        <r:RibbonHighlightingList>
                            <r:RibbonHighlightingListItem>Thing 1</r:RibbonHighlightingListItem>
                            <r:RibbonHighlightingListItem>Thing 2</r:RibbonHighlightingListItem>
                            <r:RibbonHighlightingListItem>Thing 3</r:RibbonHighlightingListItem>
                            <r:RibbonHighlightingListItem>Thing 4</r:RibbonHighlightingListItem>
                            <r:RibbonHighlightingListItem>Thing 5</r:RibbonHighlightingListItem>
                        </r:RibbonHighlightingList>
                    </r:RibbonApplicationMenu.RecentItemList>
                           .
                           .
                           .

Cheers,
Rob

Thanks Rob, I got some help in a different thread which showed me the same solution.

I should have closed this out here.
